comments.comment: We have reached a grim milestone and should mourn every single death. At the same time we need to reflect on the situation and see the underpinning reasons for this utter failure. Also, assess the leaders and adminstrators and their intelect and capability to handle a dangerous situation. With this number of deaths, it is evident that the responses and the strategies were inefficient, in most instances counterproductive. Sinhala new year was a classic example, the vox populi of the public health professionals were to restrict movement to stifle the spread of the virus. Gotabhaya and the Rajapaksha Clan didn't have the intelligence to listen since they seem to live under this illusion of " we know best" "we did best". The Clan did not have any intention to honestly control the situation and the basic ascertain was new year was the best time to let people enjoy and forget about the failing government.
HEH HEH mama HONDATA kola Digatama koranawa
